trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGGYR3ALAGHIRI_00399_DIGGIN_000_000<tab>If you have something to ask me, make it quick. I'm on patrol.
TEXT_REGGYR3ALAGHIRI_00399_DIGGIN_000_010<tab>My name is Diggin. I'm one of the Ala Mhigan Resistance tasked with keeping this town safe.

TEXT_REGGYR3ALAGHIRI_00399_DIGGIN_000_011<tab>That being said, I do not plan on merely protecting it. Ala Ghiri's suffered under the Empire for twenty years; I'd like to do my part to help them rebuild.
TEXT_REGGYR3ALAGHIRI_00399_DIGGIN_000_020<tab>This is Ala Ghiri. It was a popular stop on the trade route to the Far East before the Empire took the village for their own.
TEXT_REGGYR3ALAGHIRI_00399_DIGGIN_000_021<tab>The trade route went the same way as Ala Ghiri's freedom. The village has only managed to survive the past few decades by trading with imperial troops.

TEXT_REGGYR3ALAGHIRI_00399_DIGGIN_000_022<tab>No one will be trading by land with the Far East as long as the Empire draws breath; however, there is hope yet for Ala Ghiri if they increase trade with Ul'dah and Gridania.
